languages.text: "Даже нечестивые ксеносы не в силах совладать с постигшей их напастью. Сколь жалко выглядят их пустые оболочки..."
"Even the wicked xenos were no match for the scourge that has befallen them. How pitiful their empty shells look..."
languages.original_text: "Даже нечестивые ксеносы не в силах совладать с постигшей их напастью. Сколь жалко выглядят их пустые оболочки..."

traits.locale_text: "Even the wicked xenos were no match for the scourge that has befallen them. How pitiful their empty shells look..."
"Even the wicked xenos were no match for the scourge that has befallen them. How pitiful their empty shells look..."
"Even the wicked xenos were no match for the scourge that has befallen them. How pitiful their empty shells look..."
"Even the wicked xenos were no match for the scourge that has befallen them. How pitiful their empty shells look..."

languages.text: 「悪辣な異種族さえ、彼らに降りかかった災難には及ぶまい。なんと哀れな抜け殻か…」
languages.original_text: "Even the wicked xenos were no match for the scourge that has befallen them. How pitiful their empty shells look..."

traits.locale_text: 「悪辣な異種族さえ、彼らに降りかかった災難には及ぶまい。なんと痛ましい抜け殻か…」

languages.text: “即便是邪恶的异形，也无法抵御从天而降的灾厄。他们的空壳看起来真可怜啊……”
languages.original_text: "Even the wicked xenos were no match for the scourge that has befallen them. How pitiful their empty shells look..."

traits.locale_text: “即便是邪恶的异形，也无法抵御从天而降的灾厄。他们的空壳看起来真可怜啊……”

languages.text: « Même les cruels xénos n'étaient pas de taille à résister au fléau qui s'est abattu sur eux. Leurs enveloppes vides ont quelque chose de pitoyable... »
languages.original_text: "Even the wicked xenos were no match for the scourge that has befallen them. How pitiful their empty shells look..."

traits.locale_text: « Même les cruels xénos n'étaient pas de taille à résister au fléau qui s'est abattu sur eux. Leurs enveloppes vides ont quelque chose de pitoyable... »

languages.text: «Ni los viles xenos pudieron hacer frente al azote que les esperaba. Sus cáscaras vacías tienen un aspecto deplorable...».
languages.original_text: "Even the wicked xenos were no match for the scourge that has befallen them. How pitiful their empty shells look..."

traits.locale_text: «Ni los viles xenos pudieron hacer frente al azote que les esperaba. Sus cáscaras vacías tienen un aspecto deplorable...».

languages.text: "Selbst die niederträchtigsten Xenos sind nichts im Vergleich mit der Geißel, die sie befallen hat. Wie armselig ihre leeren Hüllen doch aussehen ..."
languages.original_text: "Even the wicked xenos were no match for the scourge that has befallen them. How pitiful their empty shells look..."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst die niederträchtigsten Xenos sind nichts im Vergleich mit der Geißel, die sie befallen hat. Wie armselig ihre leeren Hüllen doch aussehen ..."

languages.text: "Habis zenolar bile üzerlerine çöken felakete karşı çaresiz kalmış. Şu boş kabuklarının ne kadar acınası durduğuna bir bakın."
languages.original_text: "Even the wicked xenos were no match for the scourge that has befallen them. How pitiful their empty shells look..."
